commits.subject: docs: update HISTORY.md, CLAUDE.md, SESSION_NOTES.md
commits.body:
Following the process and principles:
- HISTORY.md: Added Phase 2 cleanup entry
- CLAUDE.md: Fixed perspective framework description, noted legacy folder names
- SESSION_NOTES.md: Updated with current session progress

This completes the documentation gap identified during process review.

commits.subject: docs: add folder renaming as low-priority technical debt
refactor: complete removal of Combined/Shareholder perspective references
commits.body:
Code changes:
- Remove 'combined' perspective fallbacks in perspective-toggle.js
- Remove combined projection generation in growth-projections.js
- Remove consolidation rendering in compliance-analyzer.js
- Remove consolidation fields from all 6 model files
- Remove unused 'combined' parameter from tax position calculation
- Update keyboard shortcuts display (removed 'C' key)

Documentation updates:
- Update README.md to show two-perspective analysis
- Update BUSINESS_GUIDE.md to remove shareholder view references
- Update MANUAL_TESTING_GUIDE.md to remove shareholder testing
- Remove Shareholder Perspective sections from all model concept docs
- Update registry.js and results-display.js comments
- Delete completed REFACTOR_PLAN_REMOVE_COMBINED.md

Terminology updates:
- 'three perspectives' → 'two perspectives'
- 'Net Effect' references removed
- 'combined asset maximisation' → clearer client-focused language

commits.subject: Merge pull request #88 from devmade-ai/claude/setup-preferences-qzCKj
commits.body: chore: change default perspective to developer

commits.subject: docs: update documentation for Combined perspective removal
commits.body:
Phase 10 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- CLAUDE.md: remove Shareholder perspective, update terminology
- HISTORY.md: add refactor change log entry
- TODO.md: mark refactor as complete
- SESSION_NOTES.md: update session status

commits.subject: feat: update user-facing terminology
commits.body:
Phase 9 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- index.html: rename Inter-Company to Transaction Tool, update descriptions
- party-selector.js: remove isShareholderPerspectiveAvailable, update comments

commits.subject: chore: clean up entity configuration
commits.body:
Phase 8 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- Remove sameGroup and consolidationRequired flags from DEFAULT_ENTITY_CONFIG
- Keep mutualOwnership for transfer pricing compliance features

commits.subject: feat: remove group terminology from compliance and charts
commits.body:
Phase 7 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- compliance-analyzer.js (UI): remove Group Net Tax and Effective Rate displays
- advanced-visualizations.js: remove combined color, Group Net Position waterfall
- structure-selector.js: rename consolidation to partyRelationship, update labels

commits.subject: feat: remove combined from sensitivity and projections UI
commits.body:
Phase 6 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- sensitivity-visualizations.js: replace combined.totalValue with buyer.asset
- projection-visualizations.js: remove combined from overview, table, and CSV
- sensitivity-analysis.js: replace combined metric with buyer asset

Note: Backend growth-projections.js still generates combined data (unused by UI).

commits.subject: feat: remove combined from comparison features
commits.body:
Phase 5 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- comparison-view.js: remove Combined section from metrics
- comparison-manager.js: replace Combined Net with Buyer Asset
- storage.js: remove combined from CSV export and summary, update defaults
- diff-view.js: replace Combined Net Cash with Buyer Asset

commits.subject: feat: remove combined calculations from all 6 models
commits.body:
Phase 4 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- Remove calculateCombinedPerspective function from all models
- Remove combined from return objects
- Models affected: 1-6 (cost-plus, licence, joint-dev, BOT, sale, SaaS)

commits.subject: feat: remove Combined perspective rendering
commits.body:
Phase 3 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- Remove 'combined' case from switch statement
- Delete renderCombinedPerspective function (~150 lines)

commits.subject: feat: remove Combined tab from perspective toggle
commits.body:
Phase 2 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- Remove 'combined' from PERSPECTIVES object
- Remove 'C' keyboard shortcut handler

commits.subject: chore: change default perspective to developer
commits.body:
Phase 1 of refactor to remove Combined perspective.
- app-state.js: default to 'developer' instead of 'combined'
- results-display.js: fallback to developer perspective

commits.subject: Merge pull request #87 from devmade-ai/claude/review-preferences-alignment-Jpv2L
commits.body: docs: align documentation with preferences framework

commits.subject: docs: align documentation with preferences framework
commits.body:
- Add missing HISTORY.md entry for preferences framework creation
- Populate TODO.md with refactor plan backlog item (was empty)
- Update SESSION_NOTES.md with current session context
- Keep detailed refactor plan file, referenced from TODO.md

commits.subject: Merge pull request #86 from devmade-ai/claude/review-preferences-KzuQ7
commits.body: docs: add user preferences section to top of CLAUDE.md

commits.subject: docs: add cleanup guideline to AI Notes
commits.body:
Added reminder to clean up completed or obsolete docs/files and
remove references to them - keeps codebase tidy and avoids confusion.

commits.subject: docs: add session notes guideline and document current session
commits.body:
- Added AI Note to keep SESSION_NOTES.md lean
- Documented this session's work: preferences framework established

commits.subject: docs: clarify TODO.md is AI-managed
commits.body:
Updated principle 9 to make clear that TODO.md is managed by the AI
assistant (capturing things noticed during sessions) and can be
reviewed by the user.

commits.subject: docs: add AI Notes section to preferences
commits.body:
A place for AI-specific reminders and learnings that improve session
quality. Seeded with initial notes about reading files before editing,
checking existing patterns, and committing before session end.

commits.subject: docs: reorder preferences so repeatable process is last
commits.body:
"Repeatable process" says "ensure all the above" so it logically
should come after all other principles, including "Capture ideas".

commits.subject: docs: add SESSION_NOTES.md for preserving context between sessions
commits.body:
- Created docs/SESSION_NOTES.md with Current/Previous session sections
- Updated preference #7 to reference SESSION_NOTES.md
- Removed session notes section from TODO.md (now separate concern)

Separates session context from task backlog for cleaner organization.

commits.subject: docs: create TODO.md for capturing ideas between sessions
commits.body:
Simple structure with Backlog, Ideas, and Notes for Next Session sections
to ensure lower priority items and important context aren't lost.

commits.subject: docs: add capture ideas principle to preferences
commits.body:
Added principle to track lower priority items and improvements in
docs/TODO.md so they persist between sessions and aren't lost.
